/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of nature and urbanity to the landscape. Cars can be seen driving on the road, indicating a bustling city life. In the background, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting different parts of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing its blend of nature and urban development.
